pkgmetadata.longdescription: Convert 'XLSForm' to Structured 'Word' Document // Converts an 'XLSForm' (survey in 'Excel') into a well-structured 'Word' document, including sections, skip logic, options, and question labels. Designed to support survey documentation, training materials, and data collection workflows. The package was developed based on field experience with 'XLSForm' and humanitarian operations, aiming to streamline documentation and enhance training efficiency.
